FuncDef: This command specifies an IPsec tunnel name. An IPsec client sets up the encrypted tunnel across public network. The 7750 SR IPsec MDA acts as a concentrator gathering, and terminating these IPsec tunnels into an IES or VPRN service. This mechanism allows as service provider to offer a global VPRN service even if node of the VPRN are on an uncontrolled or insecure portion of the network.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IPsec tunnel name, up to 32 characters.
Keyword used to create the IPsec tunnel instance. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.
